messages.message: Question: do we have instrumentation that will allow us to see how many apps are on agent vs legacy mode in DB, or should I add that as a task to GA scope?

hey, just to verify we're talking apps not build project, nor agent mode app *runs* right? In which case, if we are defining agent mode apps as ones compiled when the build project is in agent mode, I don't think there's an easy way/one-liner DB query to do this. As of now, we don't store this info for apps (mostly using this thread (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0516UPPMT3/p1757030562022839?thread_ts=1757006909.208419&cid=C0516UPPMT3) as reference)
